Home.info: Manage your information, privacy and security so to {{appTitle}} meets your needs.

UserInfo.title: Personal Information
UserInfo.info: Basic information, such as your name and photo, used in {{appTitle}} services
UserInfo.subInfo1: Some information may be visible to others using {{appTitle}} services.
UserInfo.subInfo1AriaLabel: Learn more about what information can be visible to others when you use {{appTitle}} services
UserInfo.subInfo1FirstNameInfo: Changes made to your name will affect your entire {{appTitle}} Account.
UserInfo.subInfo1LastNameInfo: Changes made to your name will affect your entire {{appTitle}} Account.
UserInfo.subInfo1BirthDateInfo:
Your date of birth can be used for account security and personalization.
  in {{appTitle}} services. If this {{appTitle}} Account is for a company or organization, use the
  date of birth of the person managing the account.

Your gender can be used for personalization in the {{appTitle}} Services, including how we
